name: O I O
description:
o | o is a game based on cooperation, that invites you to discover an oniric universe. Explore the world to find the way to repare the heart of a strange machinery. You will need two controller. 

Player one: Move | Left Joystick 

                           Jump | A 

                           Dash | X 

Player two: Move hand left | Left Joystick 

                            Move hand right | Right Joystick
